summary: An ordinance relating to and amending Plat 32E page 96 of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in SW corner of the intersection of E. Madison St. and 43rd Ave. N. thence south 91.57', thence west 89.27'thence northeast 127.68 to beginning, as Community Business (BC) Zone.
